article: "Mum, can I invite my classmate Brett over to stay tomorrow night, please? It's Friday, and we don't have any  _  Can I, please?" Mum was sitting at the kitchen table. " Just sit there, don't move." He rushed over to the kitchen drawer and  _  what he needed -two spanners. " Hang on, Mum," he said. " This won't take a second." After some  _  , James was finished.
